query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Io era già da quell’ ombre partito, 2 e seguitava l’orme del mio duca, 3 quando di retro a me, drizzando ’l dito,
4 una gridò: «Ve’ che non par che luca 5 lo raggio da sinistra a quel di sotto, 6 e come vivo par che si conduca!».
query.result:
**English:**
1 I had already departed from those shadows, 2 and was following the footsteps of my guide, 3 when behind me, pointing his finger,
4 someone cried out: "See how the ray from the left 5 does not seem to shine on the one below, 6 and how he seems to conduct himself as if alive!"
**Malay:**
1 Aku telah meninggalkan bayang-bayang itu, 2 dan mengikuti jejak pemanduku, 3 ketika di belakangku, sambil menunjuk dengan jarinya,
4 seseorang berteriak: "Lihatlah bagaimana sinar dari kiri 5 tampaknya tidak bersinar pada orang di bawah itu, 6 dan bagaimana dia tampaknya berperilaku seolah-olah hidup!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Li occhi rivolsi al suon di questo motto, 8 e vidile guardar per maraviglia 9 pur me, pur me, e ’l lume ch’era rotto.
query.result:
**English:**
7 I turned my eyes at the sound of this speech, 8 and I saw her looking at me with wonder, 9 only me, only me, and the light that was broken.
**Malay:**
7 Aku mengalihkan pandanganku ke arah suara ucapan ini, 8 dan kulihat dia menatapku dengan heran, 9 hanya aku, hanya aku, dan cahaya yang telah padam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 «Perché l’animo tuo tanto s’impiglia», 11 disse ’l maestro, «che l’andare allenti? 12 che ti fa ciò che quivi si pispiglia?
13 Vien dietro a me, e lascia dir le genti: 14 sta come torre ferma, che non crolla 15 già mai la cima per soffiar di venti;
16 ché sempre l’omo in cui pensier rampolla 17 sovra pensier, da sé dilunga il segno, 18 perché la foga l’un de l’altro insolla».
query.result:
**English:**
10 "Why is your spirit so entangled," 11 said the master, "that it slows your progress? 12 What is it that troubles you here?
13 Come after me, and let people talk: 14 stand like a firm tower, whose top 15 never sways in the wind;
16 for the man in whom new thoughts 17 continually arise, one upon the other, 18 loses his way, because one thought 19 drives out another."
**Malay:**
10 "Mengapa jiwamu begitu terjerat," 11 kata sang guru, "sehingga memperlambat langkahmu? 12 Apa yang membuatmu gelisah di sini?
13 Ikutlah aku, dan biarkan orang-orang berbicara: 14 berdirilah seperti menara yang kokoh, yang puncaknya 15 tidak pernah goyah oleh tiupan angin;
16 karena manusia yang pikirannya selalu muncul 17 bertubi-tubi, satu demi satu, akan tersesat, 18 karena satu pikiran 19 menyingkirkan pikiran lainnya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Che potea io ridir, se non «Io vegno»? 20 Dissilo, alquanto del color consperso 21 che fa l’uom di perdon talvolta degno.
query.result:
**English:**
19 What could I say in reply, except “I am coming”? 20 I said it, somewhat sprinkled with the color 21 that sometimes makes a man worthy of forgiveness.
**Malay:**
19 Apa yang dapat kukatakan sebagai balasan, kecuali “Aku datang”? 20 Kukatakan itu, agak diwarnai dengan warna 21 yang terkadang membuat seseorang layak untuk diampuni.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 E ’ntanto per la costa di traverso 23 venivan genti innanzi a noi un poco, 24 cantando ‘Miserere’ a verso a verso.
query.result:
**English:**
22 And meanwhile, along the coast sideways 23 some people were coming towards us a little ahead, 24 singing ‘Miserere’ verse by verse.
**Malay:**
22 Dan sementara itu, di sepanjang pantai ke samping 23 beberapa orang datang ke arah kami sedikit di depan, 24 menyanyikan ‘Miserere’ ayat demi ayat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 E ’l mio maestro: «Voi potete andarne 32 e ritrarre a color che vi mandaro 33 che ’l corpo di costui è vera carne.
query.result:
**English:**
31 And my master: "You can go 32 and report to those who sent you 33 that this man's body is real flesh.
**Malay:**
31 Dan guruku: "Kamu boleh pergi 32 dan laporkan kepada mereka yang mengutusmu 33 bahwa tubuh orang ini adalah daging yang sebenarnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Se per veder la sua ombra restaro, 35 com’ io avviso, assai è lor risposto: 36 fàccianli onore, ed esser può lor caro».
query.result:
**English:**
34 If I remain to see his shade, 35 as I expect, that is enough of an answer for them: 36 let them honor him, and he may be dear to them.
**Malay:**
34 Jika aku tetap tinggal untuk melihat bayangannya, 35 seperti yang kuduga, itu sudah cukup sebagai jawaban bagi mereka: 36 hormatilah dia, dan dia mungkin akan disayangi oleh mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Vapori accesi non vid’ io sì tosto 38 di prima notte mai fender sereno, 39 né, sol calando, nuvole d’agosto,
40 che color non tornasser suso in meno; 41 e, giunti là, con li altri a noi dier volta, 42 come schiera che scorre sanza freno.
query.result:
**English:**
37 Vapors lit up I did not see so quickly 38 at the first night ever to pierce the serene sky, 39 nor, the sun setting, clouds of August,
40 that their color did not return up there in less time; 41 and, having arrived there, with the others they turned toward us, 42 like a troop that runs without rein.
**Malay:**
37 Wap yang menyala tidak kulihat secepat itu 38 pada malam pertama yang pernah menembus langit yang tenang, 39 atau, matahari terbenam, awan-awan bulan Agustus,
40 yang warnanya tidak kembali ke atas sana dalam waktu yang lebih singkat; 41 dan, setelah sampai di sana, bersama yang lain mereka berbalik ke arah kita, 42 seperti pasukan yang berlari tanpa kendali.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 «Questa gente che preme a noi è molta, 44 e vegnonti a pregar», disse ’l poeta: 45 «però pur va, e in andando ascolta».
query.result:
**English:**
43 "These people who press upon us are many, 44 and they come to you with prayers," said the poet: 45 "but still go on, and listen as you go."
**Malay:**
43 "Orang-orang ini yang mendesak kita sangat banyak, 44 dan mereka datang kepadamu dengan doa," kata penyair itu: 45 "tetapi tetaplah berjalan, dan dengarkanlah sambil berjalan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 «O anima che vai per esser lieta 47 con quelle membra con le quai nascesti», 48 venian gridando, «un poco il passo queta.
query.result:
**English:**
46 "O soul who go to be joyful 47 with those limbs with which you were born," 48 they came crying, "slow your pace a little.
**Malay:**
46 "Wahai jiwa yang pergi untuk menjadi gembira 47 dengan anggota tubuh yang dengannya kamu dilahirkan," 48 mereka datang menangis, "perlambat sedikit langkahmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Guarda s’alcun di noi unqua vedesti, 50 sì che di lui di là novella porti: 51 deh, perché vai? deh, perché non t’arresti?
52 Noi fummo tutti già per forza morti, 53 e peccatori infino a l’ultima ora; 54 quivi lume del ciel ne fece accorti,
55 sì che, pentendo e perdonando, fora 56 di vita uscimmo a Dio pacificati, 57 che del disio di sé veder n’accora».
query.result:
**English:**
49 See if you ever saw any of us, 50 so that you may carry news of him from there: 51 oh, why do you go? Oh, why do you not stop?
52 We were all once forcibly dead, 53 and sinners until the final hour; 54 here, a light from heaven made us aware,
55 so that, repenting and forgiving, we departed 56 from life, reconciled with God, 57 who inflames us with the desire to see Him».
**Malay:**
49 Lihatlah jika kamu pernah melihat salah seorang dari kami, 50 sehingga kamu dapat membawa berita tentangnya dari sana: 51 oh, mengapa kamu pergi? Oh, mengapa kamu tidak berhenti?
52 Kami semua pernah mati secara paksa, 53 dan berdosa hingga saat terakhir; 54 di sini, cahaya dari surga membuat kami sadar,
55 sehingga, dengan bertobat dan memaafkan, kami berangkat 56 dari kehidupan, berdamai dengan Tuhan, 57 yang membakar kami dengan keinginan untuk melihat-Nya».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 E io: «Perché ne’ vostri visi guati, 59 non riconosco alcun; ma s’a voi piace 60 cosa ch’io possa, spiriti ben nati,
61 voi dite, e io farò per quella pace 62 che, dietro a’ piedi di sì fatta guida, 63 di mondo in mondo cercar mi si face».
query.result:
**English:**
58 And I: "Why do I not recognize any of you in your visions, 59 but if it pleases you, 60 tell me what I can do, spirits well-born,
61 and I will do it for that peace 62 that, following in the footsteps of such a guide, 63 I am made to seek from world to world."
**Malay:**
58 Dan aku: "Mengapa aku tidak mengenali seorang pun dari kalian dalam penglihatan kalian, 59 tetapi jika kalian berkenan, 60 katakan apa yang dapat kulakukan, roh-roh yang lahir dengan baik,
61 kalian katakan, dan aku akan melakukannya demi kedamaian itu 62 yang, mengikuti jejak pemandu seperti itu, 63 membuatku mencari dari dunia ke dunia."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 E uno incominciò: «Ciascun si fida 65 del beneficio tuo sanza giurarlo, 66 pur che ’l voler nonpossa non ricida.
query.result:
**English:**
64 And one began: "Everyone trusts 65 in your kindness without swearing to it, 66 as long as the will cannot but be fulfilled.
**Malay:**
64 Dan seorang memulai: "Setiap orang percaya 65 pada kebaikanmu tanpa bersumpah, 66 asalkan keinginan itu tidak dapat tidak terpenuhi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Ond’ io, che solo innanzi a li altri parlo, 68 ti priego, se mai vedi quel paese 69 che siede tra Romagna e quel di Carlo,
70 che tu mi sie di tuoi prieghi cortese 71 in Fano, sì che ben per me s’adori 72 pur ch’i’ possa purgar le gravi offese.
query.result:
**English:**
67 Therefore, I, who speak before the others alone, 68 beg you, if ever you see that land 69 that lies between Romagna and Charles's land,
70 that you be courteous with your prayers for me 71 in Fano, so that they pray well for me 72 so that I may purge my grave offenses.
**Malay:**
67 Oleh karena itu, aku, yang berbicara di hadapan yang lain sendirian, 68 memohon padamu, jika suatu saat kau melihat negeri itu 69 yang terletak di antara Romagna dan tanah Charles,
70 agar kau bersikap sopan dengan doa-doamu untukku 71 di Fano, sehingga mereka berdoa dengan baik untukku 72 agar aku dapat membersihkan pelanggaran-pelanggaranku yang berat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Quindi fu’ io; ma li profondi fóri 74 ond’ uscì ’l sangue in sul quale io sedea, 75 fatti mi fuoro in grembo a li Antenori,
76 là dov’ io più sicuro esser credea: 77 quel da Esti il fé far, che m’avea in ira 78 assai più là che dritto non volea.
query.result:
**English:**
73 Thus I was; but the deep wounds 74 from which the blood flowed on which I sat, 75 were made in my lap by the Antenori,
76 there where I thought I was safest: 77 he of Este had it done, who hated me 78 far more than justice would allow.
**Malay:**
73 Demikianlah keadaanku; tetapi luka-luka yang dalam 74 dari mana darah mengalir yang kududuki, 75 dibuat di pangkuanku oleh para Antenori,
76 di tempat yang kupikir paling aman: 77 orang Este yang melakukannya, yang membenciku 78 jauh lebih dari yang seharusnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Ma s’io fosse fuggito inver’ la Mira, 80 quando fu’ sovragiunto ad Orïaco, 81 ancor sarei di là dove si spira.
query.result:
**English:**
79 But if I had fled towards the Mira, 80 when I was overtaken at Oriago, 81 I would still be there where one breathes.
**Malay:**
79 Tetapi jika aku melarikan diri ke arah Mira, 80 ketika aku terkejar di Oriago, 81 aku masih akan berada di sana tempat orang bernafas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Corsi al palude, e le cannucce e ’l braco 83 m’impigliar sì ch’i’ caddi; e lì vid’ io 84 de le mie vene farsi in terra laco».
query.result:
**English:**
82 I ran to the marsh, and the reeds and the mud 83 entangled me so that I fell; and there I saw 84 the water from my veins forming a pool on the ground.
**Malay:**
82 Aku berlari ke rawa, dan alang-alang serta lumpur 83 menjeratku hingga aku jatuh; dan di sana kulihat 84 air dari pembuluh darahku membentuk genangan di tanah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Poi disse un altro: «Deh, se quel disio 86 si compia che ti tragge a l’alto monte, 87 con buona pïetate aiuta il mio!
88 Io fui di Montefeltro, io son Bonconte; 89 Giovanna o altri non ha di me cura; 90 per ch’io vo tra costor con bassa fronte».
query.result:
**English:**
85 Then another said: "Oh, may that desire 86 be fulfilled that draws you to the high mountain, 87 with good piety help mine!
88 I was from Montefeltro, I am Bonconte; 89 Giovanna or others do not care for me; 90 that's why I go among these with a bowed head".
**Malay:**
85 Kemudian yang lain berkata: "Oh, semoga keinginan itu 86 terpenuhi yang membawamu ke gunung yang tinggi, 87 dengan kesalehan yang baik bantulah milikku!
88 Aku dari Montefeltro, aku Bonconte; 89 Giovanna atau yang lain tidak peduli padaku; 90 karena itu aku pergi di antara mereka dengan kepala tertunduk".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 E io a lui: «Qual forza o qual ventura 92 ti travïò sì fuor di Campaldino, 93 che non si seppe mai tua sepultura?».
query.result:
**English:**
91 And I to him: "What force or what fortune 92 drove you so far from Campaldino, 93 that your burial place was never known?".
**Malay:**
91 Dan aku kepadanya: "Kekuatan atau keberuntungan apakah 92 yang telah membawamu begitu jauh dari Campaldino, 93 sehingga tempat pemakamanmu tidak pernah diketahui?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 «Oh!», rispuos’ elli, «a piè del Casentino 95 traversa un’acqua c’ha nome l’Archiano, 96 che sovra l’Ermo nasce in Apennino.
query.result:
**English:**
94 "Oh!" he replied, "at the foot of Casentino 95 a river called Archiano crosses, 96 which rises in the Apennines above the Arno.
**Malay:**
94 "Oh!" jawabnya, "di kaki Casentino 95 melintasi sungai yang bernama Archiano, 96 yang berhulu di Apennine di atas Arno.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Là ’ve ’l vocabol suo diventa vano, 98 arriva’ io forato ne la gola, 99 fuggendo a piede e sanguinando il piano.
query.result:
**English:**
97 There where its vocabulary fails, 98 I arrived, pierced in the throat, 99 fleeing on foot and staining the plain with blood.
**Malay:**
97 Di sana di mana perbendaharaannya menjadi sia-sia, 98 aku tiba dengan luka di leher, 99 melarikan diri dengan berjalan kaki dan menodai dataran dengan darah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Quivi perdei la vista e la parola; 101 nel nome di Maria fini’, e quivi 102 caddi, e rimase la mia carne sola.
query.result:
**English:**
100 There I lost sight and speech; 101 in the name of Mary it ended, and there 102 I fell, and my flesh remained alone.
**Malay:**
100 Di sana aku kehilangan pandangan dan ucapan; 101 dalam nama Maria itu berakhir, dan di sana 102 aku jatuh, dan dagingku tinggal sendirian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Io dirò vero, e tu ’l ridì tra ’ vivi: 104 l’angel di Dio mi prese, e quel d’inferno 105 gridava: “O tu del ciel, perché mi privi?
106 Tu te ne porti di costui l’etterno 107 per una lagrimetta che ’l mi toglie; 108 ma io farò de l’altro altro governo!”.
query.result:
**English:**
103 I will tell the truth, and you repeat it among the living: 104 the angel of God took me, and the one from hell 105 cried out: “O you from heaven, why do you deprive me?
106 You carry away from me the eternal soul of this man 107 for a single tear that he sheds for me; 108 but I will make other arrangements for him!”
**Malay:**
103 Aku akan mengatakan yang sebenarnya, dan engkau ulangi di antara orang-orang yang hidup: 104 malaikat Tuhan mengambilku, dan malaikat neraka 105 berteriak: “Hai engkau dari surga, mengapa engkau merampasku?
106 Engkau membawa pergi dariku jiwa abadi orang ini 107 karena setetes air mata yang ditumpahkannya untukku; 108 tetapi aku akan membuat pengaturan lain untuknya!”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Ben sai come ne l’aere si raccoglie 110 quell’ umido vapor che in acqua riede, 111 tosto che sale dove ’l freddo il coglie.
query.result:
**English:**
109 I know well how in the air gathers 110 that humid vapor which turns back into water, 111 as soon as it rises to where the cold seizes it.
**Malay:**
109 Aku tahu betul bagaimana di udara terkumpul 110 wap lembap itu yang kembali menjadi air, 111 segera setelah naik ke tempat dingin menangkapnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Giunse quel mal voler che pur mal chiede 113 con lo ’ntelletto, e mosse il fummo e ’l vento 114 per la virtù che sua natura diede.
query.result:
**English:**
112 That evil will arrived which only asks for evil 113 with the intellect, and moved the smoke and the wind 114 by the power that its nature gave it.
**Malay:**
112 Datanglah kejahatan itu yang hanya meminta kejahatan 113 dengan akal budi, dan menggerakkan asap dan angin 114 oleh kuasa yang diberikan oleh sifatnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Indi la valle, come ’l dì fu spento, 116 da Pratomagno al gran giogo coperse 117 di nebbia; e ’l ciel di sopra fece intento,
118 sì che ’l pregno aere in acqua si converse; 119 la pioggia cadde, e a’ fossati venne 120 di lei ciò che la terra non sofferse;
121 e come ai rivi grandi si convenne, 122 ver’ lo fiume real tanto veloce 123 si ruinò, che nulla la ritenne.
query.result:
**English:**
115 Then the valley, as the day was spent, 116 from Pratomagno to the great ridge was covered 117 with fog; and the sky above made it so dark,
118 that the pregnant air turned into water; 119 the rain fell, and to the ditches came 120 of it that which the earth could not absorb;
121 and as was fitting for the great streams, 122 toward the royal river so swiftly 123 it rushed down, that nothing could hold it back.
**Malay:**
115 Kemudian lembah itu, ketika hari telah berakhir, 116 dari Pratomagno hingga punggung bukit yang besar tertutup 117 oleh kabut; dan langit di atas membuatnya begitu gelap,
118 sehingga udara yang mengandung hujan berubah menjadi air; 119 hujan turun, dan ke parit-parit datanglah 120 air hujan yang tidak dapat diserap oleh tanah;
121 dan sebagaimana layaknya sungai-sungai besar, 122 menuju sungai besar dengan sangat cepat 123 air itu mengalir deras, sehingga tidak ada yang dapat menahannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Lo corpo mio gelato in su la foce 125 trovò l’Archian rubesto; e quel sospinse 126 ne l’Arno, e sciolse al mio petto la croce
127 ch’i’ fe’ di me quando ’l dolor mi vinse; 128 voltòmmi per le ripe e per lo fondo, 129 poi di sua preda mi coperse e cinse».
query.result:
**English:**
124 My frozen body at the mouth 125 the rough Archian found; and that pushed 126 it into the Arno, and loosed from my chest the cross
127 that I made of myself when grief overcame me; 128 I turned to look at the banks and at the bottom, 129 then with its prey it covered and encircled me.
**Malay:**
124 Tubuhku yang membeku di muara sungai 125 ditemukan oleh Archian yang kasar; dan itu mendorongnya 126 ke dalam Arno, dan melepaskan salib dari dadaku
127 yang kubuat sendiri ketika kesedihan menguasai diriku; 128 Aku menoleh untuk melihat tepian dan dasar sungai, 129 lalu dengan mangsanya sungai itu menutupi dan mengelilingiku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 «Deh, quando tu sarai tornato al mondo 131 e riposato de la lunga via», 132 seguitò ’l terzo spirito al secondo,
133 «ricorditi di me, che son la Pia; 134 Siena mi fé, disfecemi Maremma: 135 salsi colui che ’nnanellata pria
136 disposando m’avea con la sua gemma».
query.result:
**English:**
130 "Ah, when you have returned to the world 131 and rested from the long journey," 132 the third spirit continued to the second,
133 "remember me, who am Pia; 134 Siena made me, Maremma unmade me: 135 may he be salted who, before being ringed
136 in marriage, had me as his gem."
**Malay:**
130 "Ah, ketika kamu telah kembali ke dunia 131 dan beristirahat dari perjalanan yang panjang," 132 roh ketiga melanjutkan kepada roh kedua,
133 "ingatlah aku, yang adalah Pia; 134 Siena telah menciptakan aku, Maremma telah menghancurkan aku: 135 semoga dia diasinkan yang, sebelum dilingkari
136 dalam pernikahan, telah menjadikan aku sebagai permata miliknya."
